Variables
authDomain
export const authDomain

OAuth domain

siteDomain
export const siteDomain

Domain that site is hosted on

Functions
Screen
export default function Screen()

Shows message while login is in progress and calls the correct function depending on the user's state.

Returns

<div> tag telling the user they are being logged in

sendToLogin
function sendToLogin()

Generates code verifier, stores it, and sends the user to the login screen.

getToken
function getToken()

Retrieves token returned by OAuth server, stores it, and returns user to other page. User is sent to the page passed in the URL query return or the home page if none was provided.
